4. Documentation and Metadata: Your DMP is already very good, you can however find more good guidelines about RDM in proteomics in the Elixir toolkit https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/proteomics
5. Preservation: Please note that the KU Leuven policy asks for 10 years of data preservation (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy)
7. Sharing: You can now also use KU Leuven RDR to make your data available for reuse: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
